lead_paragraph: Lisa Leslie and Temeka Johnson scored 14 points each last night, helping the host Los Angeles Sparks defeat the Seattle Storm, 68-63, in the deciding game of their W.N.B.A. playoff series. With her husband cheering courtside through a small yellow megaphone, Leslie grabbed eight rebounds. Johnson had six assists. The Sparks advanced to play Sacramento in the Western Conference finals beginning tomorrow.
